task.title: Implement Knowledge Advanced in a New Customer Portal Instance
task.shortdesc: You can enable Knowledge Advanced in a new Customer Portal instance by replacing the standard Customer Portal files with the Knowledge Advanced reference implementation files.

context.p: You can enable Knowledge Advanced in a new instance by replacing the standard pages in your development folder with the Knowledge Advanced reference implementation pages. You can replace the standard pages by downloading the reference implementation, copying them into your site, configuring the pages, and promoting the new implementation to production.
